articles.title: Biological E. Limited’s COVID-19 vaccine enters Phase I/II trial - The Indian Express
articles.description: BE's Phase I/II clinical trial will evaluate the safety and immunogenicity of the vaccine candidate at three dose levels adjuvanted with CpG 1018 plus alum, in about 360 healthy subjects in the age range of 18 to 65 years.
